ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] Media type for describing available media 	transformations
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t know of this explicitly expressed in any existing media type, but I suspect the use of XHTML DL(DT,DD) or UL(LI) and A elements along w/ a MicroFormat

but I=

along w/ a Mic=
roFormat markup would do the trick.
